participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and imaginative, Oliver enjoys deep conversations and values human connections.
participant_1.background: I have a unique way of enjoying my coffee, and I'm a dedicated worker who is still looking for the perfect partner. I love how sci fi space adventures are able to take me to other worlds and explore new possibilities. I'm not rich but I do have a lot of pictures and stories to share from my travels. I lost a patient in my arms. I don't care about social media as much as I do about my relationships with my friends and family.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Empathetic and creative, Sophia is driven by her ideals and enjoys exploring different perspectives through her work.
participant_2.background: My family is supportive of my career choices. I ride my bicycle every day to keep fit and to clear my head so I can focus on my writing. I met the most interesting people while filming my documentary. I think my pets are the best things in my life. I like alternative rock.

content.text: Great, just rode my bicycle to work and started writing.
Nice! What kind of work do you do?
I'm a documentary filmmaker, I'm working on a new project about the lives of homeless people.
Oh that's so interesting! What made you want to do that?
I'm passionate about social justice and I think it's important to give a voice to people who are often overlooked.
That's a great mission. What's the most interesting thing you've learned so far?
I've learned a lot about the challenges that homeless people face, but I've also learned about the strength and resilience of the human spirit.
That's really inspiring. I'm sure you're doing great work.
Yes! I have a dog and a cat. They're my best friends.
Aww, that's so sweet. I love animals.
Me too! They make life so much better.
